org.tms.api

Interface Subset

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BaseElement, Listenable, TableElement, Taggable

    public interface Subset
extends TableElement
    A Table subset, containing a collection of rows, columns, cells and other subsets.

    Subsets are equivalent to cell ranges in other spreadsheets. Subsets can be used as the target of a statistical calculation in a Derivation, can be labeled, and are dynamic, meaning that as new cells are added to elements within a Subset, they are automatically added to the containing subset as well.

    Subsets are created by calling Table.addSubset(...).

    Since:
    "1.0"
    Version:
    "1.1"

      • add

        boolean add(TableElement... tableElements)
        Add TableElements to this Subset. Returns true if this Subset did not contain some or all of the TableElements specified in tableElements, or false if tableElements is null or if all of the elements are already present in this Subset.

        Parameters:
        tableElements - TableElements to add to this Subset
        Returns:
        true if any of the tableElements were not contained in this Subset
        Throws:
        InvalidParentException - if an element in tableElements isn't associated with this Subset's Table
        IllegalTableStateException - if tableElements contains this Subset
        DeletedElementException - if this subset or any of the elements in tableElements have been deleted

      • remove

        boolean remove(TableElement... tableElements)
        Removes the TableElements specified in tableELements from this Subset.
        Parameters:
        tableElements - TableElements to be removed from this Subset, if present
        Returns:
        true if any TableElements were removed as a result of this call

      • contains

        boolean contains(TableElement tableElement)
        Returns true if this Subset contains tableElement.
        Parameters:
        tableElement - TableElement whose presence in this Subset is to be tested
        Returns:
        true if this Subset contains tableElement

      • export

        void export(String fileName,
            BaseIOOptions<?> options)
     throws IOException
        Exports this Subset to the specified file format using the export options given in options. If no Rows are present in the subset, all rows in the underlying Table are exported. If no Columns are present in the subset, all columnss in the underlying Table are exported.
        Parameters:
        fileName - the file name where the subset is written to
        options - the BaseIOOptions that specifies the output file format as well as any specific export options
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if fileName or options are null
        IOException - if fileName cannot be created

        void export(OutputStream out,

     throws IOException
        Throws:
        IOException
